channel.title: Helder Burato Berto
channel.description: Hey there, I'm Helder Burato Berto. I'm a Brazilian Front End Developer living in Porto, Portugal.

item.title: Upgrade Husky to Latest Version
item.description: How to upgrade Husky package to the latest version 5.x
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: Studying Software Development with Videos and Note-Taking
item.description: On this article, I'm going to share my process of studying software development with videos and note-taking.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: How to Implement Stack Data Structure in JavaScript
item.description: On this article, I'll show how to implement `Stack` data structure in JavaScript focusing on how simple it is and how it works.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: Patterns for Writing Better Git Commit Messages
item.description: It's an opinionated guide I keep with me to consult every time I catch myself in doubt if I'm writing nice commit messages with context of what I'm delivering.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: How to Avoid Array Mutation
item.description: In this article, I'll focus on showing how to add, edit and remove items in an array causing mutation and non-mutation ways.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: Write your own Dotfiles
item.description: Sometime ago I need to format my Mac twice times in the same week and it's was very painful to configure all the things.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: Understanding concepts of functional programming with JavaScript
item.description: Let's understand the fundamental concepts of functional programming using JavaScript language.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: Exploring the bind method in JavaScript
item.description: In this article we will cover the "bind" functionality that makes up the JavaScript language.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: Decoding Proxies in JavaScript
item.description: In this post we will approach the object Proxy included in the version ECMAScript 6, creating the possibility of interception and making possible creation of customized methods.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: Simplify JavaScript Arrays
item.description: In this post we'll cover some methods of JavaScript that will make it easier for you to work with arrays and write more elegant codes.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)

item.title: What is a Pure Function?
item.description: Whenever you are told about pure functions, keep the following in mind.
item.author: helder.burato@gmail.com (Helder Burato Berto)
